name: Reincarnated As An Adorable Walking Rock In A Peaceful Gardening Sim Game
name_original: Reincarnated As An Adorable Walking Rock In A Peaceful Gardening Sim Game
description:
Reincarnated As An Adorable Walking Rock In A Peaceful Gardening Sim Game
Choose to be Pebble-chan, Rock-kun, or Stone-sensei. Walk around growing plants and enjoying nature sounds.

A cozy top-down 2D pixel art gardening sim sandbox with satisfying sounds.

Free to play online (no ads or microtransactions) on desktop web browser
$1 download for Mac/Windows
The free online version has all the same features except for saving.
Once the game has been downloaded, it can be played offline.

Latest update 2023-02-13
- Added "night" mode
- Added waterfalls
- Added unicorn friend
- Added more flowers and trees
- Added a way to have multiple saves + optional random name generator

---

Instructions

TAB to choose Pebble-chan, Rock-kun, or Stone-sensei.
They grow different plants.

Hold down ARROWS or WASD to walk.
Hold down SPACE or ENTER to grow plants while walking-- small chance to be visited by a butterfly.

LEFT-CLICK and drag to move a plant.
RIGHT-CLICK to remove a plant-- small chance to get a tree.

Z to snooze. SPACE or ENTER to wake up.

Find the unicorn statue and give it a flower to summon or release a unicorn friend.

MINUS- and EQUAL= to zoom.
ESC to hide or show the menu.

"clear" removes all plants and critters.
"help" brings up the help window.
